com.github.nfcforandroid.api.client

Interface INfaIntentWrite


  • public interface INfaIntentWrite
    Author:
    jefBinomed Interface which defines the methods to use for callback management when writing tags This interface is to use when you want to manage a callback when you write on nfc tags.
    See Also:
    INfaBeam

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageWrite(boolean ok, java.lang.Exception error)
      Callback method which gives you the state of the write.

    • Method Detail

      • messageWrite

        void messageWrite(boolean ok,
                java.lang.Exception error)
        Callback method which gives you the state of the write.
        Parameters:
        ok - : true if the write was well done, false else.
        error - : the error corresponding to problem of write. Only valuate when the param ok is set to false
